1
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
describe('Service Registry', function(){
  var ServiceRegistry = require('../../lib/service_registry');
 
  describe('#httpService', function(){
    it('ignores services with no action', function(){
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry();
      var service  = { routes: {} };
 
      spyOn(registry, 'wrapServiceMethod');
 
      registry.httpService(service);
 
      expect(registry.wrapServiceMethod).not.toHaveBeenCalled();
    });
 
    it('wraps services with only one route', function(){
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry();
      var service  = { routes: { 'GET /foo': 'foo' }, foo: Function.apply() };
 
      spyOn(registry, 'wrapServiceMethod');
 
      registry.httpService(service);
 
      expect(registry.wrapServiceMethod).toHaveBeenCalledWith(service.foo);
    });
 
    it('wraps service with multiple routes', function(){
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry();
      var service = {
        routes: {
          'GET /foo': 'foo',
          'GET /bar': 'bar'
        },
        foo: Function.apply(),
        bar: Function.apply()
      };
 
      spyOn(registry, 'wrapServiceMethod');
 
      registry.httpService(service);
 
      expect(registry.wrapServiceMethod).toHaveBeenCalledWith(service.foo);
      expect(registry.wrapServiceMethod).toHaveBeenCalledWith(service.bar);
    });
 
    it('returns a map of routes to callbacks', function(){
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry();
      var service  = { routes: {'GET /foo': 'foo'}, foo: Function.apply() };
 
      var httpService = registry.httpService(service);
 
      expect(Object.keys(httpService)).toEqual(['GET /foo']);
      expect(typeof httpService['GET /foo']).toEqual('function');
    });
  });
 
  describe('#wrapServiceMethod', function(){
    it('takes a function and redirects the http params to it', function(){
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry();
      var fn  = jasmine.createSpy('service method');
      var req = {params: 'http params'};
      var res = {json: Function.apply()};
 
      var callback = registry.wrapServiceMethod(fn);
      callback(req, res);
 
      expect(fn).toHaveBeenCalledWith(req.params);
    });
 
    it('use function return as http response body', function(){
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry();
      var fn = function(){ return 'service response'; };
      var req = { params: 'http params' };
      var res = { json: function(){ } };
 
      spyOn(res,'json');
 
      var callback = registry.wrapServiceMethod(fn);
      callback({}, res);
 
      expect(res.json).toHaveBeenCalledWith('service response');
    });
  });
 
  describe('#register', function(){
 
    it('throws an error when no verb is passed', function(){
      var router   = { get: Function.apply() };
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry(router);
      var map      = { '/foo': Function.apply() };
      var error    = new Error('Route "/foo" needs a verb and path');
 
      spyOn(router, 'get');
 
      expect(function(){
        registry.register('/path/to', map);
      }).toThrow(error);
    });
 
    it('throws an error when no path is passed', function(){
      var router   = { get: Function.apply() };
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry(router);
      var map      = { 'GET': Function.apply() };
      var error    = new Error('Route "GET" needs a verb and path');
 
      expect(function(){
        registry.register('/path/to', map);
      }).toThrow(error);
    });
 
    it('handles GET requests', function(){
      var router   = { get: Function.apply() };
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry(router);
      var map      = { 'GET /foo': Function.apply() };
 
      spyOn(router, 'get');
 
      registry.register('/path/to', map);
 
      expect(router.get).toHaveBeenCalledWith('/path/to/foo', map['GET /foo']);
    });
 
    it('handles POST requests', function(){
      var router   = { post: Function.apply() };
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry(router);
      var map      = { 'POST /foo': Function.apply() };
 
      spyOn(router, 'post');
 
      registry.register('/path/to', map);
 
      expect(router.post).toHaveBeenCalledWith('/path/to/foo', map['POST /foo']);
    });
 
    it('handles PUT requests', function(){
      var router   = { put: Function.apply() };
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry(router);
      var map      = { 'PUT /foo': Function.apply() };
 
      spyOn(router, 'put');
 
      registry.register('/path/to', map);
 
      expect(router.put).toHaveBeenCalledWith('/path/to/foo', map['PUT /foo']);
    });
 
    it('handles DELETE requests', function(){
      var router   = { delete: Function.apply() };
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry(router);
      var map      = { 'DELETE /foo': Function.apply() };
 
      spyOn(router, 'delete');
 
      registry.register('/path/to', map);
 
      expect(router.delete).toHaveBeenCalledWith('/path/to/foo', map['DELETE /foo']);
    });
 
    it('handles PATCH requests', function(){
      var router   = { patch: Function.apply() };
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry(router);
      var map      = { 'PATCH /foo': Function.apply() };
 
      spyOn(router, 'patch');
 
      registry.register('/path/to', map);
 
      expect(router.patch).toHaveBeenCalledWith('/path/to/foo', map['PATCH /foo']);
    });
 
    it('throws an error when an unsupported verb is used', function() {
      var router   = { get: Function.apply() };
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry(router);
      var map      = { 'PONY /foo': Function.apply() };
      var error    = new Error('Verb "PONY" is not supported');
 
      expect(function(){
        registry.register('/path/to', map);
      }).toThrow(error);
    });
  });
 
  describe('#registerHttpService', function(){
    it('wraps a service and registers it', function(){
      var registry = new ServiceRegistry();
      var service  = {
        routes: { 'GET /foo': 'foo'},
        foo: 'foo'
      };
 
      spyOn(registry, 'httpService');
      spyOn(registry, 'register');
 
      registry.registerHttpService('', service);
 
      expect(registry.httpService).toHaveBeenCalledWith(service);
      expect(registry.register).toHaveBeenCalled();
    });
  });
 
});
 
Generated by istanbul at Mon Jan 06 2014 14:46:56 GMT+0000 (WET)
